COMMENT: This is an example JSON file for the problems.
Of course, the 'COMMENT' elements are not used.
Name should be a unique name for the problem.
name: svc_rbf
COMMENT: rs_data points to the file that stores the data of the random search experiments
on which to build surrogate models.
Contains metafeatures of the tasks in `rs_data`.
Specify where to load/store the surrogate models.
Specify which hyperparameters to construct symbolic defaults for.
Specify which experiments of `rs_data` to use.
Here specify to only use results where 'svc__kernel'=='rbf'
Specify which operators to use. Currently not used.
Strings of individuals which will also be evaluated to give reference performance.
